dialogueTree.title: Siileng: ""You keep coming back. That's good,..."
dialogueTree.text: "You keep coming back. That's good, officer! Keep browsing those clothes, keep saving that economy!"

links.title: Savoir Faire: "If he really wants to save the econ..."
links.text: If he really wants to save the economy he'd let you pay with net worth. Go over and ask him if you can

links.title: You: ""Save the economy? What are you tal..."
links.text: "Save the economy? What are you talking about?"

links.title: Siileng: ""Haven't you heard, officer? We've..."
links.text: "Haven't you heard, officer? We've got to be economically conscious. Recycle your cash, keep it in circulation! Don't buy new things! Buy eco!"

links.title: You: ""This doesn't make any sense. Why e..."
links.text: "This doesn't make any sense. Why exactly does the economy need saving?"

links.title: Siileng: ""Look around, officer! You see all..."
links.text: "Look around, officer! You see all these premium goods, just sitting there, *not* getting bought? We've got to keep the flow of goods moving!"

links.title: Siileng: ""Is this really the economy we want..."
links.text: "Is this really the economy we want to leave to our children?"

links.title: You: ""You're right. We've got to save Mo..."
links.text: "You're right. We've got to save Mother Economy!"

links.title: Siileng: ""That's the spirit! We've all got t..."
links.text: "That's the spirit! We've all got to do our part. Your part is to open the box and buy some clothes."

links.title: You: ""But I don't have children. I think.""
links.text: "But I don't have children. I think."

links.title: Siileng: ""Too bad, officer. Kids make it all..."
links.text: "Too bad, officer. Kids make it all worthwhile. Without kids, who's going to be around to enjoy the economy?" He points at the clothes. "Don't let me stop you. Open the box and browse a little!"

links.title: You: ""It's just nature: Powerful economi..."
links.text: "It's just nature: Powerful economies expand, weak economies go extinct."

links.title: Siileng: ""I can't go extinct, officer! I've..."
links.text: "I can't go extinct, officer! I've got kids to feed. Once an economy goes extinct, it messes up the whole eco-system. You got to think about the consequences!"

links.title: You: ""This *economy* is really just a di..."
links.text: "This *economy* is really just a distraction from the cultural issues. You know -- *immigrants* and..."

links.title: Siileng: ""And what?""
links.text: "And what?"

links.title: You: ""And genetic atrophy.""
links.text: "And genetic atrophy."

links.title: Siileng: ""Oh." The street vendor pauses. "Lo..."
links.text: "Oh." The street vendor pauses. "Look man, I'm not into *politics*. I like everyone. Check out the box!"

links.title: You: ""Those socialists in academia.""
links.text: "Those socialists in academia."

links.title: You: ""I don't know.""
links.text: "I don't know."

links.title: Siileng: ""Doesn't matter," the street vendor..."
links.text: "Doesn't matter," the street vendor replies. "All that matters is the box. Check it out, officer."

links.title: You: ""Look man, I just want to buy some..."
links.text: "Look man, I just want to buy some clothes."

links.title: Siileng: ""That's good, officer! That's exact..."
links.text: "That's good, officer! That's exactly what the economy wants you to do."

links.title: You: ""Thanks for the advice, I'll try to..."
links.text: "Thanks for the advice, I'll try to be more economically conscious."

links.title: Siileng: ""Very cool. The economy thanks you,..."
links.text: "Very cool. The economy thanks you, officer."

links.title: You: "Browse through the box."
links.text: Browse through the box.

links.title: Pile of Clothes: "You find your hands deep in tattere..."
links.text: You find your hands deep in tattered and faded garments made from weird polyester blends that make your body itch and sweat in all the wrong places.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "The box smells like cat piss -- or..."
links.text: The box smells like cat piss -- or like an old person with no money.

links.title: Siileng: ""Economical, but also trendy!" the..."
links.text: "Economical, but also trendy!" the street vendor shouts. "Look first-hand, buy second-hand. Keep the economy moving!"

links.title: You: "Find something worth salvaging from..."
links.text: Find something worth salvaging from that pile of rags.

links.title: Composure: "Something cold grazes your hand. Sy..."
links.text: Something cold grazes your hand. Synthetic and sleek -- a windbreaker. 'SURF', it says, but also: 'WIND', 'SUMMER', '100% WATERPROOF', and 'SPORT'. All in different typefaces.

links.title: Endurance: "This jacket is the apex of human ev..."
links.text: This jacket is the apex of human evolution -- the moment at which man became weatherproof.

links.title: Shivers: "Practical, and yet it may deaden yo..."
links.text: Practical, and yet it may deaden your senses to the world around you. Possibly because of the awful typeface.

links.title: Siileng: ""Good choice, officer! Mega-sporty...."
links.text: "Good choice, officer! Mega-sporty. And it's only 4.50 for you, sir!"

links.title: Composure: "No good. All you can come up with a..."
links.text: No good. All you can come up with are some treated wool pants. You can tell they're too tight around your thighs and too loose around the waist.

links.title: You: "Touch them."
links.text: Touch them.

links.title: Composure: "They itch. Like hell. Like an itch-..."
links.text: They itch. Like hell. Like an itch-pit in hell.

links.title: Half Light: "THE ITCH IS SO BAD YOU'LL WANT TO S..."
links.text: THE ITCH IS SO BAD YOU'LL WANT TO SMASH SOMEONE'S FACE IN.

links.title: Siileng: ""All natural materials, see?" The s..."
links.text: "All natural materials, see?" The street vendor interrupts, guiding your hand over the fabric. "Real wool, 100% skin-friendly! And they're yours for only 2 re√°l!"

links.title: You: "Discard the woolly pants."
links.text: Discard the woolly pants.

links.title: Siileng: ""No luck?" the street vendor says,..."
links.text: "No luck?" the street vendor says, visibly disappointed. "Why not take another look, officer? Keep supporting the economy!"

links.title: You: ""I want to buy the windbreaker.""
links.text: "I want to buy the windbreaker."

links.title: Siileng: ""Gotta prepare for springtime, righ..."
links.text: "Gotta prepare for springtime, right?" The street vendor seems pleased.

links.title: You: ""I want to buy those itchy pants.""
links.text: "I want to buy those itchy pants."

links.title: Siileng: ""You won't regret it, officer!" The..."
links.text: "You won't regret it, officer!" The street vendor smiles broadly.

links.title: You: "[Leave for now.]"
links.text: [Leave for now.]

links.title: Rhetoric: "Save the economy? That sounds off."
links.text: Save the economy? That sounds off.

dialogueTree.title: Pile of Clothes: "There are clothes inside. Cheap sec..."
dialogueTree.text: There are clothes inside. Cheap second-hand clothes, smelling of strangers' body odours.

links.title: Siileng: ""Don't be shy, these are premium-cl..."
links.text: "Don't be shy, these are premium-class clothes! Good quality fabrics, best retro design! Save the economy with your style, officer!"

links.title: Savoir Faire: "How about some premium-class servic..."
links.text: How about some premium-class service over here? Like paying with net worth. Go over and ask him if you can do that.
